original_title: Iron Maiden: Death On The Road
overview: In the autumn of 2003 Iron Maiden performed their most theatrical and spellbinding shows to date on the spectacular Dance Of Death world tour. Filmed in the Dortmund Westfallenhalle and painstakingly edited by Steve Harris, Death On The Road brings you all the power, drama and sheer spectacle of this tour.
title: Iron Maiden: Death On The Road
